// terminologies Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. Money Received: The amount received in the gigforce wallet from the client for the completed gigs. Money Withdrawn: The amount transferred from the gigforce wallet to the giger’s account. Earning: Sum of the amount received for gigs completed in this month + Sum of the amount yet to be received for completed gigs in this month Wallet balance: Sum of the amount received in gigforce wallet till date - Sum of amount subtracted from the wallet via any transfers till date Monthly earning: Total of the amount received in a month and the amount pending to be paid for completed gigs. Monthly goal or monthly earning goal: a goal set by the user for monthly earning. This is the basis for showing giger’s Payment disputed / Payment due: The amount to be paid for a completed gig that is not approved by the client. Invoice: The receipt of completion of a gig and acknowledgment of the payment to be made to the giger. Invoice generated: The gig where a receipt of completion of a gig and acknowledgment of the payment to be made to the giger. Pending invoice: The gigs which are completed but the invoice is not generated. Please let us know more about your Gig . Gig Location Pan Card Image Please provide following details. It helps verify your name and date of birth and also helps with payments to your wallet. Alert You are re-uploading your PAN details. They will be verified once again, which may take up to 7 days.
